jason.infra.centralised

Class CentralisedAgArch

  • java.lang.Object
    • jason.architecture.AgArch
      • jason.infra.centralised.CentralisedAgArch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AgArchInfraTier, java.lang.Comparable<AgArch>, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CentralisedAgArchAsynchronous, CentralisedAgArchForPool, RunCentralisedMAS.CentralisedAgArchSynchronousScheduled

    public class CentralisedAgArch
extends AgArch
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class provides an agent architecture when using Centralised infrastructure to run the MAS inside Jason. Each agent has its own thread.

    Execution sequence:

    • initAg,
    • setEnvInfraTier,
    • setControlInfraTier,
    • run (perceive, checkMail, act),
    • stopAg.

      • informCycleFinished

        public void informCycleFinished(boolean breakpoint,
                                int cycle)
        Informs the infrastructure tier controller that the agent has finished its reasoning cycle (used in sync mode).

        breakpoint is true in case the agent selected one plan with the "breakpoint" annotation.
